metadata.title: CVE-2024-29944 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An attacker was able to inject an event handler into a privileged objectthat would allow arbitrary JavaScript execution in the parent process.Note: This vulnerability affects Desktop Firefox only, it does not affectmobile versions of Firefox. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 124.0.1and Firefox ESR < 115.9.1.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
